about_the_game:
Incarnate the Moonrider and start his revenge against its creators through this demo.

Vengeful Guardian: Moonrider, a side scrolling action platformer channeling the golden age of classic 16-bit action games in a refined, full-throttle quest for revenge.

REVENGE OF THE MOONRIDER


Humanity finds an unlikely hero in Vengeful Guardian: Moonrider’s oppressed world; authoritarians have built super soldiers as weapons of war, but their creators have sealed their fate by bringing the warrior known as Moonrider online. Conceived as a tool to uphold a totalitarian state, the Moonrider has rejected its intended purpose, instead choosing a relentless battle for vengeance against its creators and fellow super soldiers.

GEAR UP AND PREPARE TO FIGHT AGAINST YOUR CREATORS


Vengeful Guardian: Moonrider’s design holds the best classic action game elements in the laser-precise sights of its starring ninja, keeping combat snappy, responsive and challenging.

Powerful modifier chips are guarded and hidden throughout the adventure, allowing the biomechanical super soldier to customize its fighting style while gaining killer advantages and abilities.

BEAUTIFUL PIXEL GRAPHICS BACKED UP WITH AN AMAZING SOUNDTRACK


The game’s gorgeously bleak world expertly recreates the 16-bit era through intricate pixel art, building a striking, compact gauntlet across eight deadly stages. Vengeful Guardian: Moonrider revels in top-notch, refined platforming action for a tight, focused experience that never lets its blade get dull.

Moreover, an incredible soundtrack that brings out the retro vibe is here to back up the beautiful graphics creating the perfect retro experience.

FEATURES


● By Joymasher, the studio behind amazing retro games Oniken, Odallus and Blazing Chrome
● Authentic retro games feeling
● Discover special chips along your adventure and custom your fighting style with killer abilities
● Incredible soundtrack
● Many deadly stages to overcome
